property.name: outputLabel
property.label: Output: Label
property.description: The variant changes the appearance of an input field. Accepted variants include standard, label-inline, label-hidden, and label-stacked. This value defaults to standard, which displays the label above the field. Use label-hidden to hide the label but make it available to assistive technology. Use label-inline to horizontally align the label and input field. Use label-stacked to place the label above the input field.

property.name: choiceSubLabels
property.label: Collection - SubLabel
property.description: A string collection used to populated the sublabels

property.name: choiceLabels
property.label: Collection - Label
property.description: A string collection used to populated the labels

property.name: choiceValues
property.label: Collection - Value
property.description: A string collection used to populated the additional values

property.name: choiceIcons
property.label: Collection - Icons
property.description: A string collection used to populated the icons. Please visit https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/ for available icons. Example: standard:lead

property.name: choiceSrcs
property.label: Collection - Srcs
property.description: A string collection of image urls to populate the icons

property.name: iconSize
property.label: Icon Size
property.description: The size of the icon. Options include xx-small, x-small, small, medium, or large. The default is medium.

property.name: buttonSize
property.label: Box Size
property.description: The size of the box in pixels. The box is a square.

property.name: iconVariant
property.label: Icon Variant
property.description: The variant changes the shape of the avatar. Valid values are empty, circle, and square. This value defaults to square.

property.name: autoNext
property.label: Enable Auto Next
property.description: Selecting an option will automatically transition the flow if enabled. Please note there is an accessibility impact when enabling this option. If a user utilizes a keyboard or screen reader that will be unable to get to any other choice but the first.
